## Checklist

### General

- [ ] My code follows the project's code style and conventions
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or TypeScript errors

### Component-Specific (if applicable)

- [ ] Component is RTL-compatible (tested with `dir="rtl"`)
- [ ] Component meets WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards
- [ ] Component is fully typed with TypeScript
- [ ] All props are properly documented
- [ ] Component exports proper types and interfaces
- [ ] Component example is documented

### Testing

- [ ] I have tested the changes locally
- [ ] ESLint passes (`pnpm lint`)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`pnpm build`)
- [ ] Tested in both RTL and LTR modes
- [ ] Tested keyboard navigation
- [ ] Tested with screen reader (if applicable)
- [ ] Cross-browser tested (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)

### Documentation

- [ ] Updated README if necessary
- [ ] Added JSDoc comments to exported functions/components
- [ ] Updated component documentation page
- [ ] Added code examples
- [ ] Updated CHANGELOG (if applicable)
